game_description: You can have an incredible skating experience right in VR and in complete comfort. Swing left and right to move forward. Build trails and catch your opponents in them. But be careful not to get caught yourself! ;)

review_2: I don’t wanna be that guy and I’m not trying to be I don’t wanna poop all over your project I like the idea because I love Tron I can’t believe no one has made a light cycle game yet it’s driving me crazy. And when I saw your app that’s what I thought— Blades of glory meets Tron￼, But the controls are bat crap crazy and uncomefortable, not intuitive￼. It is a headache to get yourself in motion in the first place, literally. and once you’re in motion it is incredibly hard to steer because there really isn’t any indicator as to how to steer effectively. the only tip that comes in handy in the tutorial is lifting your hands up, What was what I felt like I was doing the whole time but without direction￼￼. the head motion was unclear as well and again, kind of a￼￼ literal headache. it has potential. I’m not a fan of Voxel graphics but I like the idea -if it could somehow incorporate human pvp in the future. I don’t have a solution to the controls but I’m telling you, that game will not takeoff with the controls as is￼￼. And while it’s not a complaint of mine but game is a shallow. I mean ,with limited AI people probably will get bored with it after a weekend. But great effort and good idea. I only give it a 2 So that if you figure it out… you’ll know you earned your stars. ￼￼￼
review_3: First, thank you developers of the game, I liked it. More please. It takes time to learn and get use to the control and movement. But it is not hard and good fun feeling of body workout. Please continue to improve new gameplay , free style endless skate, more maps please outdoor open air if possible. Thank you
review_4: This game is fantastic even in this very early stage! HUGE Tron fan and Skader truly does this franchise a justice. My only input for later development is the addition of discs in hands, even if they are only cosmetic. If possible those disc can be thrown at players inflicting damage similar to the movie. However these are just suggestions but would be a nice addition. Skader is the only game I have found to truly do Tron a justice!
